title: Inline Formatting Context
description: The Inline Formatting Context in HTML is a layout mechanism that controls the positioning and flow of inline-level elements within a block container.
content: The layout model where elements are laid out horizontally, one after the other, within the same line. This context applies to text and inline elements, such as `<span>` or `<a>` and can be affected by properties like `line-height` and `text-align`.
